column6: Text
Salutation to the Triple Gem
[Ajahn Amaro](teacher:AA) introduces Kittisaro and Ajahn Jitindriyā.
I met Ajahn Chah through the eyes and hearts of those who lived with him.
The language of wisdom is the language of the heart.|Ajahn Chah
Ajahn Amaro meets Ajahn Chah.
"Sleep is delicious."
Ajahn Chah teaches his disciples in everyday living situations.
"Is the log heavy?"
A monk drops a tape recorder after getting an electric shock.
I never lived with him, so I never got the chance to get disillusioned with him.
Ajahn Sumedho wants Ajahn Chah to affirm whether he had attained a degree of insight.
Collected Teachings p. 606
We talk about things to develop and thigs to give up, but there's really nothing to develop and nothing to give up.|Ajahn Chah
Collected Teachings p. 102
The way Ajahn Chah trained was phenomenal.
I feel incredibly indebted to Ajahn Chah.
[Ajahn Amaro](teacher:AA) introduces Ajahn Sumedho.
The inspiration of Ajahn Chah.
He made sense out of monasticism.
I think with any Westerner, we're so full of ourselves when we go [to Asia]. We want to get enlightened....
How Ajahn Sumedho met Ajahn Chah.
How Ajahn Chah taught me.
It was through example that I really learned.
How would Ajahn Chah fare in England?
An emergency landing in Rome.
Ajahn Chah was threatened walking almsround in London.
Ajahn Chah made me look at myself.
Your practice now is patience.|Ajahn Chah
Ajahn Chah chats for hours after Pāṭimokkha.
